title: Grow Plant Based Protein in the Garden! | Vegetarian or Vegan Homestead

tasks.task: Planting protein-rich crops in the garden
subtasks: Prepare the garden bed by moving aside mulch or debris
Dig shallow trenches in the prepared garden bed
Mix compost into the garden soil to improve aeration
Carefully sow lentil seeds, ensuring proper spacing
Stagger planting dates for different varieties to extend harvest
Intercrop with quick-maturing vegetables like beets and radishes
Direct sow peanuts in warm climates or adapt northern varieties
Direct sow soybeans, paying attention to heirloom and organic seed sources
Sprout legumes prior to cooking for easier digestibility
Plant amaranth and quinoa seeds for grain crop development
Introduce manure tea to nutrient-rich garden beds
Plant spinach in well-drained, cool-weather conditions
Direct sow various bean varieties, including pole runners
Demonstrate making soy milk from homegrown soybeans
